00067   template<>
00068   struct graph_traits<TREX::transaction::graph> {
00069   private:
00070     // Helpers :
00071     typedef TREX::transaction::graph graph_type;
00072 
00073   public:
00074     // Graph concept
00080     typedef graph_type::reactor_id        vertex_descriptor;
00087     typedef graph_type::relation_type     edge_descriptor;
00088 
00093     typedef graph_type::directed_category      directed_category;
00104     typedef graph_type::edge_parallel_category edge_parallel_category;
00109     typedef graph_type::traversal_category     traversal_category;
00110 
00119     static inline vertex_descriptor null_vertex() {
00120       return graph_type::null_reactor();
00121     }
00122 
00123     // Incidence Graph Concept
00131     typedef TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor::external_iterator  out_edge_iterator;
00136     typedef TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor::size_type          degree_size_type;
00137 
00138     // Bidirectional Graph Concept
00139     typedef TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor::internal_iterator in_edge_iterator;
00140 
00141     // Adjacency Graph Concept
00150     typedef boost::adjacency_iterator<graph_type, vertex_descriptor,
00151                                   out_edge_iterator, 
00152                                   graph_type::difference_type> adjacency_iterator;
00153     // vertex List graph Concept
00158     typedef graph_type::reactor_iterator     vertex_iterator;
00163     typedef graph_type::size_type            vertices_size_type;
00164 
00165     // edge List graph Concept
00172     typedef graph_type::edge_iterator     edge_iterator;
00177     typedef graph_type::size_type         edges_size_type;
00178   }; // boost::graph_traits<TREX::transaction::graph>
00179 
00180   /*
00181    * Incidence Graph Concept
00182    */
00198   inline std::pair< TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor::external_iterator, 
00199                   TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor::external_iterator >
00200   out_edges(TREX::transaction::graph::reactor_id r,
00201            TREX::transaction::graph const &g) {
00202     if( TREX::transaction::graph::null_reactor()!=r )
00203       return std::make_pair(r->ext_begin(), r->ext_end());
00204     else {
00205       TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor::external_iterator null;
00206       return std::make_pair(null, null);
00207     }
00208   }
00209   
00226   inline TREX::transaction::graph::reactor_id
00227   source(TREX::transaction::graph::relation_type const &rel,
00228         TREX::transaction::graph const &g) {
00229     return &(rel.client());
00230   }
00231 
00251   inline TREX::transaction::graph::reactor_id
00252   target(TREX::transaction::graph::relation_type const &rel,
00253         TREX::transaction::graph const &g) {
00254     if( rel.active() )
00255       return &(rel.server());
00256     return TREX::transaction::graph::null_reactor();
00257   }
00258 
00275   inline TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor::size_type 
00276   out_degree(TREX::transaction::graph::reactor_id r,
00277             TREX::transaction::graph const &g) {
00278     return TREX::transaction::graph::null_reactor()==r?0:r->count_externals();
00279   }
00280 
00281   /*
00282    * Bidirectional Graph Concept
00283    */
00284   inline std::pair<TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor::internal_iterator, 
00285                  TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor::internal_iterator>   
00286   in_edges(TREX::transaction::graph::reactor_id r, 
00287           TREX::transaction::graph const &g) {
00288     return std::make_pair(r->int_begin(), r->int_end());
00289   }
00290 
00291   inline TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor::size_type 
00292   in_degree(TREX::transaction::graph::reactor_id r, 
00293            TREX::transaction::graph const &g) {
00294     if( TREX::transaction::graph::null_reactor()==r )
00295       return 0;
00296     return r->count_internal_relations();
00297   }
00298 
00299   inline TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor::size_type 
00300   degree(TREX::transaction::graph::reactor_id r, TREX::transaction::graph const &g) {
00301     return out_degree(r, g)+in_degree(r,g);
00302   }
00303   
00304   /*
00305    * Adjacency graph concept 
00306    */
00307 
00322   inline std::pair< graph_traits<TREX::transaction::graph>::adjacency_iterator,
00323                   graph_traits<TREX::transaction::graph>::adjacency_iterator >
00324   adjacent_vertices(TREX::transaction::graph::reactor_id r,
00325                   TREX::transaction::graph const &g) {
00326     std::pair< TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor::external_iterator, 
00327               TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor::external_iterator >
00328       tmp = out_edges(r, g);
00329     return std::make_pair
00330       (graph_traits<TREX::transaction::graph>::adjacency_iterator(tmp.first, &g),
00331        graph_traits<TREX::transaction::graph>::adjacency_iterator(tmp.second, &g));
00332   }
00333 
00334   /*
00335    * Vertex List Graph Concept
00336    */
00350   inline std::pair<TREX::transaction::graph::reactor_iterator,
00351                  TREX::transaction::graph::reactor_iterator>
00352   vertices(TREX::transaction::graph const &g) {
00353     return std::make_pair(g.reactor_begin(), g.reactor_end());
00354   }
00355 
00370   inline TREX::transaction::graph::size_type
00371   num_vertices(TREX::transaction::graph const &g) {
00372     return g.count_reactors();
00373   }
00374 
00375   /*
00376    * Edge List Graph Concept
00377    */
00378   inline std::pair< TREX::transaction::graph::edge_iterator,
00379                   TREX::transaction::graph::edge_iterator >
00380   edges(TREX::transaction::graph const &g) {
00381     return std::make_pair(g.relation_begin(), g.relation_end());
00382   }
00383 
00384   inline TREX::transaction::graph::size_type
00385   num_edges(TREX::transaction::graph const &g) {
00386     return g.count_relations();
00387   }

00409       struct graph_edge_name_map 
00410        :public boost::put_get_helper<TREX::utils::Symbol, 
00411                                   graph_edge_name_map> {
00412 
00413        typedef boost::readable_property_map_tag category;
00414        typedef TREX::utils::Symbol              value_type;
00415        typedef TREX::utils::Symbol const &      reference;
00416        typedef graph::relation_type             key_type;
00417 
00426        reference operator[](key_type const &rel) const {
00427          return rel.name();
00428        }
00429       }; // TREX::transaction::details::graph_edge_name_map
00430 
00444       struct graph_vertex_name_map 
00445        :public boost::put_get_helper<TREX::utils::Symbol, 
00446                                   graph_vertex_name_map> {
00447 
00448        typedef boost::readable_property_map_tag category;
00449        typedef TREX::utils::Symbol              value_type;
00450        typedef TREX::utils::Symbol const &      reference;
00451        typedef graph::reactor_id                key_type;
00452 
00463        reference operator[](key_type r) const {
00464          static TREX::utils::Symbol const null_name("0x0");
00465 
00466          if( graph::null_reactor()==r )
00467            return null_name;
00468          else
00469            return r->getName();
00470        }
00471       }; // TREX::transaction::details::graph_vertex_name_map
00472       
00486       struct graph_vertex_id_map
00487        :public boost::put_get_helper<long, 
00488                                   graph_vertex_id_map> {
00489       public:
00490        typedef boost::readable_property_map_tag category;
00491        typedef long                             value_type;
00492        typedef long                             reference;
00493        typedef graph::reactor_id                key_type;
00494 
00501        graph_vertex_id_map(graph const &g)
00502          :m_g(&g) {}
00503        
00512        value_type operator[](key_type r) const {
00513          return m_g->index(r);
00514        }
00515       private:
00516        graph const *m_g;
00517 
00518       }; // TREX::transaction::details::graph_vertex_id_map
00519       
00520     } // TREX::transaction::details    
00521     
00531     class graph_names_writer {
00532     public:
00534       graph_names_writer() {}
00535       
00544       void operator()(std::ostream &out, graph::reactor_id r) const {
00545        if( graph::null_reactor()!=r )
00546          label(out, r->getName()); 
00547       }
00556       void operator()(std::ostream &out, graph::relation_type const &rel) const {
00557        if( rel->active() ) {
00558          out<<"[label=\""<<rel->name();
00559          if( rel->accept_goals() )
00560            out<<'['<<rel->latency()<<':'<<rel->look_ahead()<<"]\" color=\"blue";
00561          out<<"\"]";
00562        } else 
00563          // display inactive relation in red
00564          out<<"[label=\""<<rel->name()<<"\" color=\"red\"]";
00565       }
00566 
00567     private:
00576       void label(std::ostream &out, TREX::utils::Symbol const &name) const {
00577        out<<"[label=\""<<name<<"\"]";
00578       }       
00579     };
00580 
00581   } // TREX::transaction
00582 } // TREX
